titles.title: Advancing GETs Act of 2025
Advancing GETs Act of 2025
Advancing Grid-Enhancing Technologies Act of 2025

A bill to require the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to establish a shared savings incentive to return a portion of the savings attributable to an investment in grid-enhancing technology to the developer of that grid-enhancing technology, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
